basics.name: Tuan Pham
basics.label: AI Research Engineer
basics.summary:
I am (going to be) a Research Engineer at VinAI Research, Vietnam. Prior to that, I was an AI Research Resident at VinAI Research. 
 I graduated with honors from Hanoi University of Science and Technology in 2020.

skills.name: Language Proficiency
keywords: IELTS 7.5 (Reading: 8.5, Listening: 7.5, Writing: 7.0, Speaking: 6.5), test date: Nov 4th, 2020

education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
education.area: Applied Mathematics and Informatics, Talented Program (Highest Honours)

highlights: Research Engineer ăn lương sống qua ngày
Research on Exploration in Reinforcement Learning, Deep Reinforcement Learning and Representation Learning. Supervisors: Dr. Yasin Abbasi-Yadkori and Dr. Tung Pham
Worked as an AI Engineer for 3 months. Developed a distillation method for VinFast autopilot project

work.company: CMC Insitute of Science and Technology
highlights: Develop a face recognition model based on SphereFace with Caffe for edge device

work.company: Data Science Laboratory, Hanoi University of Science and Technology
highlights: Research on Topic Modelling, Continual Learning, Variational Autoencoder, under supervision of Dr.Khoat Than

work.summary: Student of Cinnamon AI Labs Intelligence Program 3, an annual intensive training program in Artificial Intelligence for young talents who desire to become AI engineers in the future.
highlights: Learn and practice about Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing

work.position: Frontend Web Developer & AI Engineer Intern

highlights: Frontend developer for SalesTrekk, an online solution for business
Integrate a chatbot for SalesTrekk, based on Google Dialogflow API
Develop a machine learning model for segmenting houses region from satellite images
